articles.title: Vaibhav Jewellers IPO subscribed 14%, retail investors bid highest on first day of issue | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Vaibhav Jewellers IPO has been subscribed 14 per cent so far on Friday, September 22. The public issue will remain open for bidding till Tuesday, September 26, 2023.
articles.content: Vaibhav Jewellers IPO Subscription Status: The initial public offering (IPO) of  hyperlocal jewellery retail chain received a muted response from investors on the first day of its issue. Vaibhav Jewe… [+3520 chars]
